text: Cyzistra or Kyzistra () was a town of ancient Cappadocia, inhabited during Roman and Byzantine times. It was mentioned by Ptolemy. Its site is located near Zengibar Kalesi, Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Cappadocia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Populated places of the Byzantine Empire Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:History of Kayseri Province
title: Cyzistra
